definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)
erhua variant of 白眼珠[bai2 yan3 zhu1]
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)

sentences.english: So, margin the reflection in her eye.

sentences.chinese: 偵探長的眼珠子都凸出來了。

sentences.english: The man on the screen had one green eye, and a cat perched on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 屏幕上的人有一隻眼珠是綠色的，肩上趴着一隻貓。

sentences.english: Or hug your sadness like an eyeless doll.
sentences.chinese: 或者像個沒有眼珠的陰鬱的娃娃，抱着憂傷。

sentences.english: If I'd done everything they say I've done, she'd have gouged my eyes out.
sentences.chinese: 如果真如檢查官所言，她會把我的眼珠挖出來。

sentences.english: Her eyes are rolled back, showing only WHITE.
sentences.chinese: 她的眼珠回滾，只能看見白色。

sentences.english: And I would stand by and watch quietly and intently, my eyes riveted on him.
sentences.chinese: 我便安靜地站在旁邊專心地望着，連眼珠也不轉一下。
眼鏡後面的眼珠子突凸出來。
和一盆有趣的眼珠子花。

sentences.english: Contempt is silent, and even the eyes do not turn over.
sentences.chinese: 輕蔑是無言，而且連眼珠也不轉過去。

sentences.english: Roger rolls his eyes. “Dude, you're such a goody-goody.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑眼珠滴溜一轉“老兄，你太虛僞了。

sentences.english: I hate a florid complexion and dark eyes in a man.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭男人長着紅潤的皮膚，黑眼珠。

sentences.english: Once her eye pupil turn and list heart, "who want money in your house?"
sentences.chinese: 她眼珠一轉，計上心來，“誰要你們家錢了？

sentences.english: He often rolled his eyes about when he was doing his homework.
sentences.chinese: 他做家庭作業時眼珠常常來回轉動。

sentences.english: They flew at its eyes and pecked and pecked.
sentences.chinese: 它們飛向老虎的眼睛，不停地啄它地眼珠。

sentences.english: His black, ophidian eyes fixed on Burak.
sentences.chinese: 他黑色的毒蛇眼珠緊盯在伯拉克身上。

definition: eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)
whirling/spinning around and around/round and plump (e.g. of fruit)
(onom.) rolling around/spinning/also pr. [gu1 lu1 lu1]/Taiwan pr. [gu2 lu4 lu5]
to roll rapidly/to spin/Taiwan pr. [gu2 lu5]
